channel.title: model-specification on YoungStatS
channel.description: Recent content in model-specification on YoungStatS

item.title: Recent challenges in model specification testing based on different data structures
item.description: Recent challenges in model specification testing based on different data structures Wednesday, November 9th, 8:00 PT / 11:00 ET / 17:00 CET Model specification testing is one of the essential methodological tasks in statistics. Recently, with the development of different data structures, envisioning concepts from classical data setups to other environments becomes very important. In the webinar, selected young statisticians will present their recent works and elaborate on different aspects of this topic.
